mapper.insert: insert into ST_RAIN_B (STCD, EQPNO, Name, RainType, RainRemark) values (#{STCD,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{EQPNO,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{rainType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{rainRemark,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select STCD, EQPNO, Name, RainType, RainRemark from ST_RAIN_B
